pkgmetadata.longdescription: An R Pandoc Writer // Contains some functions catching all messages, stdout and other useful information while evaluating R code and other helpers to return user specified text elements (like: header, paragraph, table, image, lists etc.) in pandoc's markdown or several type of R objects similarly automatically transformed to markdown format. Also capable of exporting/converting (the resulting) complex pandoc documents to e.g. HTML, PDF, docx or odt. This latter reporting feature is supported in brew syntax or with a custom reference class with a smarty caching backend.
